name: ChronicKidneyDiseaseCKD_HD_CPT
title: Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD)_HD_CPT
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for CKD Condition.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The intent of this value set is for the purpose of defining the clinical codes that constitute CKD Condition for inclusion and utilization in patients/users connected heath.),(Data Element Scope: CKD Condition for b.well.),(Inclusion Criteria: CKD CPT Codes that constitute the Primary Hypertension Condition for b.well.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)

concept.display: Documentation of treatment for nephropathy (eg, patient receiving dialysis, patient being treated for ESRD, CRF, ARF, or renal insufficiency, any visit to a nephrologist) (DM)

contains.display: Documentation of treatment for nephropathy (eg, patient receiving dialysis, patient being treated for ESRD, CRF, ARF, or renal insufficiency, any visit to a nephrologist) (DM)
